data.title: Congressman Pat Ryan
data.meta_description: Representing the 18th District of New York
data.text:
Priorities: Delivering Relief and Defending Rights

Priorities

Image

I fought to protect American freedoms in combat. Now, as the first West Point graduate to represent the Academy in the U.S. House of Representatives, I’m continuing the fight in Congress.

Image

Hudson Valley families deserve to feel safe when they walk the streets of their neighborhood or take a trip downtown.

Image

Everyone in the Hudson Valley deserves clean air, water, and soil.

Image

Hudson Valley families work hard day in and day out to make ends meet - I’m committed to delivering economic relief to ease the pressure.

Image

I serve you and I’m committed to bringing government assistance directly to you.

Latest News

August 15, 2024

Bill will prevent cuts to Social Security and protect the Social Security trust fund from depletion, ensuring that seniors and families receive the benefits they earned. Bill will also force the Social Security Administration to re-open their office in Ulster County, make offices accessible in every county

August 14, 2024

Legislative package will lower mortgage rates, crack down on Wall Street firms jacking up housing costs, incentivize development, and cut through bureaucratic red tape to unlock increased federal support for local priorities

August 13, 2024

Ryan has nominated the Dutchess County government and Sheriff’s Office for over $2.3 million in federal Community Project Funding to invest in cutting-edge technology upgrades; funding will be included in year-end House spending package. Funding would overhaul and modernize the Sheriff Office’s Analysis and Real Time Crime Intelligence Center and develop a consolidated public safety radio system for first responders
